metadata.name: AZOVSTAL
metadata.description:
Together with the Ukrainian PR community, we are putting all global popularity of the shots of photographer Orest, aka Azov fighter Dmitry Kozatsky, who has taken already famous photos at Azovstal on the NFT auction. “OREST” selportrait at AZOVSTAL plant will be listed on MAY 20, 2022, in order to help stop death in Ukraine, and help Orest and other brave ukrainian figthers of AZOVSTAL to back homes from Russian captivity. 

Buying an NFT token with our famous image, you can be sure that you are the official owner of “OREST”  shot - it will be released in a single copy.
